import Foundation

func solution(_ num_list:[Int]) -> Int {
    
    var num_list = num_list

    var prevNum = num_list[num_list.count - 2]
    var lastNum = num_list[num_list.count - 1]
    
    return num_list + [lastNum > prevNum ? lastNum - prevNum : lastNum*2]
}
